analysis: The project currently has a basic structure for a website about black holes. The HTML file needs to be completed with content related to black holes, the CSS file requires a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements, and the JavaScript file needs to be updated with functionality for animated slides and interactive elements. The current to-dos indicate that the CSS and JavaScript files are incomplete and need to be updated to match the black hole theme.

improvements.description: Add content sections about black holes, including information on their formation, types, and effects on space-time. Include interactive elements like buttons for navigating through different sections.

Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme. Add animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the design is mobile-friendly and includes a navigation menu with a hamburger icon.

Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented. Add event listeners for navigation buttons and interactive elements related to black holes.
